text: Ewald Tauer (born 8 June 1941) is a German wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman bantamweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:German male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of the United Team of Germany Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Munich
title: Ewald Tauer
